title: Impact of creatine on sprint performance in team-sport athletes

sections.abstract: This double-blind study assessed the effects of creatine loading on repeated-sprint performance in elite soccer players...
sections.introduction: Repeated sprints are a key component of many field-based sports. Creatine may improve performance by increasing phosphocreatine availability...
sections.results: The creatine group improved mean sprint time across 10 x 30 m sprints and showed reduced performance drop-off compared to placebo...
sections.conclusion: Short-term creatine loading enhanced repeated-sprint performance in team-sport athletes, supporting its use in high-intensity intermittent sports...
